name: mr_pete
text: It is a fine thing when a lady recognizes that a dude is making an effort, even when he gets it wrong.

name: carlyle
text: It is arguably the best thing.

name: draykid
carlyle
text: Well, at least Machamp was there to comfort you in his loving, Vishnu-like embrace.

name: draykid
text: Chubby for gratuitous religious reference.

name: soticoto
text:
Such a concise chain of virtuous women, tragedy, Pokémon and Hinduism.
Chubbies for all!

name: deimosrising
text: "Achewood is a celebration of the English language." Onstad may have been being sarcastic, but he shouldn't have been being.

name: catachresis
text: First line makes it.

name: gumfish
text: Nah. The straight up roasted ding-dong and God Bless are the key sentences here. At least for me.

name: fattypneumonia
text: A comment left by fattypneumonia was marked lame too many times and excluded. (marked lame by johnnybaverage, CygnusX-1, RedMange)

name: redmange
text:
I just...why would you even do this.

Why.

name: soticoto
text:
There is no China in heaven.
They all reincarnate over there.

name: centipede_damascus
text: God bless everyone this weekend. Enjoy your ding-dongs.

name: redjoker
text: i got so much ding dong i can share some.... ladies

name: gothfae
text: I hope I never have to use the phrase "I'm sorry I straight up roasted your ding-dong" in real life.

name: tekende
text: I hope I do.

name: johnnyrocker
text: I... already have?

name: flim
text: Seriously how could anybody not like Molly, she is so dang cute

name: riazm
text:
I don't know, some cheesy ass woman telling me she was there to "Fill in the blanks" sounds like the kind of condescending bullshit that would really piss - Hold on, what's that ringing? Is that the bitter single man's phone?

No its not.

Because the bitter single man's phone never rings.

name: tellumo
text: Did you just burn yourself ?

name: zapatos
text: no, it was life.

name: aelindil
text: As long as it wasn't his ding dong.

name: undyingsong
text: I have to 100% agree with you that a lady telling a dude she is there for him so she can "fill in the blanks" does indeed sound condescending and bullshit-y. :(

name: greenkoolayd
text: its only condescending to a dude who is an arrogant, prideful, unholy dickweed.

name: ojnabieoot
text: Exactly.  To someone who's clearly as awkward and bumbling as Roast Beef (and Molly might even suspect depression, though it's a bit early), it's actually a really sweet and reassuring thing to say.

name: bobbieluvsya
text:
I have a feeling that Molly knows he got depression. In my version of heaven, everyone knows your problems and are cool about it.
That said, I'm not an anthropomorphic cat.

name: relaxing
text: A comment left by relaxing was marked lame too many times and excluded. (marked lame by heccibiggs, woodenteeth, Shabadoo, erinye, peterjoel, Darthemed)

name: zapatos
text: That is why men are good for women.  We can fill up those blanks.

name: nighttoad
text: A comment left by nighttoad was marked lame too many times and excluded. (marked lame by twohundredninety, chivalress, Sprog, peterjoel)

name: godfatherofsouls
text: is he? i always thought god bless was a joke.

name: nighttoad
text: if it's a joke, i guess i don't get it.

name: trollcollins
text: Juxtaposition of 'roasted ding-dong' and 'god bless' = comedy.

name: peterjoel
text: You are confusing the comic with the man behind the comic

name: nighttoad
text: i don't know, to me the last panel looks like a direct message from onstad. do you have some kind of proof it's not? it doesn't further the plot or amuse me in any way, so why else would he put it there? i'm not trying to be confrontational, i'm genuinely curious why people thought what i said was lame.

name: godfatherofsouls
text:
I didn't think it lame, I just was genuinely curious as to if he was.
And i figured god bless was a joke because it is at the end of a strip about roasted rooster dick.

name: minortough
text: A roasted rooster dick in heaven no less. If Onstad is trying to make any statement, it might be that things aren't even perfect in heaven (chicken dick.) But I think its more likely that he recognized the humor in juxtaposing "Straight up roasted your ding dong" and "God Bless."

name: godfatherofsouls
text: yes this is what i was getting at thank you for typing it for me internet person

name: spinynorman
text: It sort of like Onstad is doing the whole Johnny Carson "Okay! Goodnight everyone! After that joke, the show is officially over. Aren't we dignified?"

name: belgand
text: That was roughly my impression as well. Still, I did not care for the whole "god bless" part in it. I mean, I can see how it might be played for laughs, but it just didn't really work for me in that context. Instead I just found it unpleasant and unwanted like anytime anyone says that to me. It definitely lowered my opinion of the entire strip.

name: reverendsam
text: also everyone believes in god on the weekends right

name: pberard
text: Well well well. Look who it is.

name: fineoakstructure
text: I give up.  Who is it?

name: audhumla
text: the good reverend sam

name: proof_man
text: dude, wayne booth's implied author. check it!

name: luckypyjamas
text: this apology came straight from the heart

name: charchar
text: Achewood: The TRUTH about What Roosters Have Under They Feathers and Whatnot

name: redmange
text: "I'm sorry little dude....I'm sorry that I straight up roasted your ding dong." got me thrown out of a fine resturant.

name: foxtrotamend
text: I want that alt text on a shirt with a list of the funniest Achewood lines.  It would be a great shirt.

name: biznart
text: Is it common practice for poultry to be circumcised?

name: johnnylandmine
text: http://ding-dong.ytmnd.com/

name: mikeronomicon
text: A nice tender moment between Roast Beef and Roast Dong.

name: nohassles
text: I love that when he speaks to the rooster he addresses the ding dong

name: cagliostro
text: That don't mean it's gonna be alright.
